post.body: I've sent the same when I can. Don't like to ignore my new followers -I see them as new friends!
Keyboard needs to be charmed by witch from Hogwarts -still waiting that request!
If you celebrate Christmas, then Christ's birthday shouldn't be celebrated either. Should ALWAYs celebrate person existence.
I often reach for the CTRL-Z for my life's un-dos. Psfth -it never works! ;P
Aside: AI aren't investing at this time. They've locked up their vaults until economy stabilizes. #socialcapital
Do tell. Reside in RTP & oldnetwork doesn't comprehend #socialcapital = value + dollar
Interesting. Old man network can't wrap their heads around #socialcapital. Time is needed to adopt/convince/secure 4 ai.
that's because they offer free IP #socialcapital via media strategy.
Monetizing is icing on the #socialcapital cake.
reading godin, ferrazzi, & macleod, #socialcapital is about gathering & building tribes, not monetizing.
I'm trying -it's on the list. But after a few days of rest, I'm eager to create.
I'd agree with that! Sounds like a good blog entry.
Embrace change is my mantra.
RT @dgtlpapercuts Still working? Here are some Last Minute Holiday Thoughts about B2B Marketing http://idek.net/17O
What's the appropriate way of thanking new followers?
Now: Assembling orders and giveaways. Later: Run to hardware to buy wood for Phase 2: Stewdio54 -Yay!
The ability to offer free IP means one must have passion/conviction of subject matter. Passion comes from within; spewing is a lame copycat
RT: 'Embrace Change' is my mantra. What's yours? (already lotsa good input)
Wow! New followers this morning. Thanks! Hope I give good tweets.
Quiet morning with coffee + sketching cats for more illos.
